price: Usimfanye mungu mwengine pamoja na Mwenyezi Mungu, usije ukawa wa kulaumiwa uliye tupika.
arabic: لَّا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَذۡمُومٗا مَّخۡذُولٗا
footnotes: Ewe mwenye jukumu! Usimfanyie Mwenyezi Mungu kuwa na mshirika, utakuja fedheheka kwa kudharauliwa, na utajaaliwa uwe mwenye kutupika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fataqʿuda madhmūman makhdhūlan
